New Records: India has a dominant record with 8 wins out of 12 meetings in T20Is and a 5-1 record in seven T20 World Cup clashes against Pakistan
Key Match Events: The match is expected to be high-energy with a spicy pitch and a history of intense rivalries
The clash is anticipated to draw strong fan support and be a thrilling spectacle
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan's unpredictability could turn the tables despite India's dominance
Fan support is crucial for the Indian team's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be held at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium in New York with a expected full house
